# paulkuo.tw — LLMs.txt

> Paul Kuo（郭曜郎）的個人網站。在技術與文明的交匯處，重建秩序、循環再利用、守護人性尊嚴。

## About the Author

Paul Kuo is the Commercial Integration & AI Digital Development Director at SDTI (佳龍科技), focusing on Taiwan-Japan semiconductor cooperation, circular economy initiatives, and AI systems development. He has 15 years of theological training, over a decade of experience in PCB manufacturing metal recovery, and extensive entrepreneurial background (AppWorks, 厚生市集, 半畝塘).

## Content Pillars

This site organizes all content under five thematic pillars:

1. **Intelligence & Order (智能與秩序)** — AI governance, agentic systems, human-AI collaboration, digital sovereignty
2. **Recycle & Reuse (循環再利用)** — Circular economy, urban mining, resource recovery, sustainability infrastructure
3. **Civilization & Human Nature (文明與人性)** — Theology meets technology, ethics, social critique, cultural analysis
4. **Creation & Enterprise (創造與建構)** — Startup methodology, business strategy, entrepreneurial reflections
5. **Reflections & Memory (沉思與記憶)** — Personal essays, life philosophy, parenting, faith journey

## Key Projects

- **CircleFlow**: AI-driven circular economy platform for resource tracking and governance
- **Multi-Model Cognitive Collaboration Framework**: Multi-agent debate engine using Claude, GPT-4o, Gemini, and Grok for structured analysis

## Site Structure

- `/` — Home page with manifesto, featured articles, social feed, and projects
- `/blog` — Full article listing (60+ articles across five pillars)
- `/articles/{slug}` — Individual article pages (semantic HTML with BlogPosting schema)
- `/about` — Author biography and background
- `/projects` — Active projects and initiatives
- `/health` — Personal health data dashboard (Fitbit integration)
- `/dashboard` — Site analytics and cost tracking

## Languages

All content is available in four languages:
- Traditional Chinese (zh-Hant) — primary, at root paths
- English (en) — at `/en/` paths
- Japanese (ja) — at `/ja/` paths
- Simplified Chinese (zh-CN) — at `/zh-cn/` paths

## Technical Details

- Built with Astro (static site generation)
- Deployed via Cloudflare Pages with GitHub Actions CI/CD
- Automated translation pipeline for en/ja/zh-cn
- Real-time data: Fitbit health metrics, Timing App AI collaboration hours
- Social feed aggregation from 8 platforms
